lead_paragraph: With reigning MVP Stephen Curry hurt again after re-injuring his left leg, the Golden State Warriors barely kept their long home winning streak going.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Hold Off Nuggets; Faried Taken Off on Stretcher
headline.main: Warriors Hold Off Nuggets; Faried Taken Off on Stretcher

snippet: With reigning MVP Stephen Curry hurt again after re-injuring his left leg, the Golden State Warriors barely kept their long home winning streak going....
